title: Rank not showing HELP!
body: So i finish my ranked provisions, and i won the last one which made me happy ending promos on 6/4. Then i leave the screen in to the post-game screen and at the top where it usually says  LP gain and loss, it says not enough games played, nothing pops up on my screen and i think, thats weird. So I exit the screen and go to my profile, AND THERES NOTHING UNDER RANKED. It didnt even say how many provisionals ive done. Granted my internet dropped out so i it counted as a leave for one game counting as 2 losses, so i though that was the problem. But my duo partner says it only says ive done 7 out of 10 provisionals and im like ?!?!?. So I re-log and its still the same and i was so confused. So i start talking with my other friend and they say ive only done 7 out of 10 on their screen to and im like ?!?!?!?. Please help im so confused and if Riot could help me with this it would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: It *could* simply be that the server handling profiles is having a bit of a slow day, but that's been happening less and less frequently. I don't recall any time that loss prevented was recently activated, but I do know of ghost games appearing occasionally, about three weeks ago. How long ago did you do your first placements?
Like 1 or 2 days after S5 started

Oh, well it *is* a possibility that some of those games were ghost games, thus meaning their result was not counted.

You could send a support ticket into Riot about this to see if they can add the games and ranking to your account. You'll need proof of it, though.
But all those games are in my match history

Irrelevant, even though they may have been saved on your account, it could have not been saved on the league server. It's good that it's happened that way, as now you have proof of actually completing those matches.

Honestly, though, the quickest and easiest solution to this is to just play more matches.

I would like to know if you actually did end up getting those games credited to your account or not.

And no problem! Anytime you have a problem with League you can ask me.
